html.p:
Change your password by...
Remote Desktop Connection to auth.splunk.aws.theburch.com
Log in with $env:user$@aws.local and your password for this system.
On your keyboard, press together the keys Ctrl+Alt+Delete (on a Mac, it's fn+ctrl+option+delete), and then select the "Change a password" option and follow the instruction on the screen.
Test your new password by logging out and back in to the Remote Desktop Connection or the Splunk system.
